sentence.text: An accurate spatial and temporal control of NL-negative regulation of Wnt signaling pathway signaling is crucial to balance excitatory and inhibitory neurotransmission, and perturbations are linked with neurodevelopmental and psychiatric disorders.

entity.text: negative regulation of Wnt signaling pathway

sentence.text: Structural analyses guided the discovery of a broad, splicing-modulated interaction network between MDGA and NL family members and helped rationalize the negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II of autism-linked mutations.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
